title: Oorellam Unnai Kandu Lyrics Nannbenda Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Oorellam unnai kandu song lyrics from Nannbenda
Singers : Unni Krishnan & Bombay Jayashree

Oorrellam unnai kandu viyandhaaraa
Unnodu kadhal solli nayandharaa.
Anbe un pinnaal yaarum alaindharaa
Kanne Nam kadhal kandu kalaindharaa.(2)

Oorellam ennai kandu viyandhaara
Ennodu kadhal solli nayandharaa

Oru murai unai kaanum pozhudhu
Iru vizhigalil roja kanavu.
Vaanaththai katti vaikka vazhigal undu ..
Naanaththai kattivaikka vazhigal illai.

Thangam vetkapattaal
manjal vannam yaarum.
Naanam kondathaale
Un vannam pon vannam
Sevvannam aachu .

Kannaa naam kannum
Kannum kalappomaa.
Kaattrodu mega thundaai
Midhappomaa.

Appappaa rekkai katti parappomaa
Aagaayaam thaandi sendru
Vasippomaa.

Sendhaen konda paalai
Vaangi vaippadhendraal
Thanga kinnam vendum.
Kaanaalaa naanthaaney
Un thanga kinnam vaa.

Oorrellam unnai kandu viyandhaaraa
Unnodu kadhal solli nayandharaa.
Anbe un pinnaal yaarum alaindharaa
Kannae Nam kadhal kandu kalaindharaa.

Oorellam ennai kandu viyandhaara
Ennodu kadhal solli nayandharaa
